mapper.select: select mNo, mId, mFirstName, mLastName, mPassword, mTel, mEmail, mBirth, mImg, mCountry, mCity, mAddress, mZipcode, mTempPassword, mRemoveDate, mIfActive from member
select mNo, mId, mFirstName, mLastName, mPassword, mTel, mEmail, mBirth, mImg, mCountry, mCity, mAddress, mZipcode, mTempPassword, mRemoveDate, mIfActive from member where mId=#{mId}
mapper.insert: insert into Member (mNo, mId, mFirstName, mLastName, mPassword, mTel, mEmail, mBirth, mImg, mCountry, mCity, mAddress, mZipCode, mIfActive) values (member_SEQ.nextval, #{mId}, #{mFirstName}, #{mLastName}, #{mPassword}, #{mTel}, #{mEmail}, #{mBirth}, #{mImg}, #{mCountry}, #{mCity}, #{mAddress}, #{mZipCode}, #{mIfActive})
